article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Surveillance Radar Engineering Services
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Linthicum Heights, Maryland, is being awarded a $35 million firm-fixed-price contract to provide engineering services for U.S. Air Force requirements applicable to the E-3 Surveillance Radar Systems.Â Oklahoma City-Air Logistics Center, Tinker Air Force Base, Oklahoma, is the contracting activity.
